tips: Did you know? You can use 'python run.py --theme <name>' to apply themes quickly!

Backgrounds change the color scheme of your terminal.

Found a bug? Report it via the 'Report Issue' menu option.
Theme-Me is open source! Feel free to contribute on GitHub.

Make sure to keep Theme-Me updated for new themes and features!

Want a clean look? Try the 'Minimal' theme (if available) or a simple font.
